body:
Comment 1: 
I can't reproduce this bug using the provided code and the toolset built using the 
repository tip.


7df3be16abbf tip
darwin, i386 (the original reporter uses amd64)

 ./8.out |tail -n5
At  9997
At  9998
At  9999
At  10000
At  10001

I ran it several times and it never hanged. Either this bug is not triggered in i386, or 
it was fixed already.

runningwild, I would suggest trying again with the latest source.
